Room.Name: Glabor Gulley Altar
Room.ShortDescription: You stand before a crude stone altar, in the open air of Glabor Gulley.
Room.LongDescription: From this height, you can look down on a community gathering area for the mountain trolls which is between you and the vile structure to the vile structure to the east. Behind the altar you can see a great circular firepit with a roaring flame.
